#

* [Java akuell 06/19: GitOps mit Helm und Kubernetes](https://www.ijug.eu/de/java-aktuell/zeitschrift/java-aktuell-archiv/detailansicht-java-aktuell/die-java-aktuell-062019-ist-online-projekt-booster-clean-code/) (together with [Bernd Stübinger](https://github.com/stuebingerb))
* [Java Talks](https://jug-in.bayern/page/publications/) (various authors)
* [CloudLand 2022: GitOps - So werden wir bessere Software Engineers](https://www.doag.org/de/home/news/top-speaker-der-cloudland-2022-teil-3-florian-heubeck/)
* GitOps - wieso, weshalb, warum; [Teil 1](https://www.cloudland.org/de/news/details/gitops-wieso-weshalb-warum-teil-1-von-3/), [Teil 2](https://www.cloudland.org/de/news/details/gitops-wieso-weshalb-warum-teil-2-von-3/) & [Teil 3](https://www.cloudland.org/de/news/details/gitops-wieso-weshalb-warum-teil-3-von-3/)
* [DCNC-Steckbrief - JUG Ingolstadt](https://www.cloudland.org/de/news/details/der-dcnc-steckbrief-teil-3-jug-ingolstadt/)
* [Devs on Tape](https://devsontape.podigee.io/17-florian-heubeck)
* [Monitoring and Hardening the GitOps Delivery Pipeline with Flux](https://medium.com/mediamarktsaturn-tech-blog/monitoring-and-hardening-the-gitops-delivery-pipeline-with-flux-a226bdef0351)
* [Reliable Application Deployments in a GitOps Setup with Flagger](https://medium.com/mediamarktsaturn-tech-blog/reliable-application-deployments-in-a-gitops-setup-with-flagger-4fb80405108c)
* [Faktoren für eine erfolgreiche Migration in eine Cloud-Organisation](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A4dDbaJ-qDk) (for the [DCNC Roundtable](https://github.com/dcnc-eu/roundtable) together with [Michel Hartmann](https://github.com/MichelHartmann))
